sentences: Uskumatu, et ta saab seejärel teada, kuidas teda mõõga panna.
Möödu mahe juurde ja andke meile kaks mõõka.
context: The word 'mõõga' refers to a stick or rod used for various purposes such as walking, measuring, or punishing. It can be used literally as an object or metaphorically in expressions related to control and discipline.
